str_indirect("use_contain","*d->mine.func","bar").
str_indirect("use_contain","*d->mine.func","foo").
str_indirect("use_contain","**d->mine.ofunc","bar").
str_indirect("use_contain","**d->mine.ofunc","foo").
str_indirect("use","*d->func","bar").
str_indirect("use","*d->func","foo").
str_indirect("use_wierd","**data->ofunc","bar").
str_indirect("use_wierd","**data->ofunc","foo").
